class_notes: (A-TERM ENROLLMENT ENDED July 10, 2023) (Same as M 697 800) (permission required to enroll; advanced application and payment of additional travel costs required)
course_description: Held in conjunction with the World Methodist Evangelism Institute international seminars, this course develops students' conceptualization and practice of mission and evangelism in a cross-cultural setting. Students learn about the ways in which churches in different parts of the world are endeavoring to communicate the promise and presence of the reign of God.
instructors: Luis Wesley de Souza - Primary Instructor
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 5764, Section #: 800, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: L. de Souza, Status: Closed
